mapper.insert: insert into log (ip, platform_type,page, ip_city, create_time, browser, action, action_object,action_desc,user_id) values (#{ip},#{platformType}, #{page}, #{ipCity}, now(), #{browser}, #{action}, #{actionObject},#{actionDesc},#{userId})
mapper.select: select ip from log where log.create_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{start} DAY) AND log.create_time < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{end} DAY) AND log.user_id = #{userId} group by log.ip
SELECT DATE(created_at) day, count(1) register FROM user WHERE created_at > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY) AND created_at < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(created_at)
